welcome.name: Andrey Tsoy
welcome.about: As a web-developer, I am passionate about creating innovative digital projects. My main goals are to develop appealing web interfaces, improve user experience, and achieve success in the online world.
welcome.call: I am always open to new opportunities!

about.title: About me
about.part1: I am a front-end developer with over 1.5 years of experience. I am proficient in the essential skills required for development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript). My main tech stack includes React.js, Redux, TypeScript, and Styled Components.
about.part2: In addition, I possess expertise in backend development. I leverage Node.js to create servers and handle CRUD operations. When it comes to databases, I utilize PostgreSQL and Redis, empowering me to efficiently manage data with flexibility.
about.part3: While I currently identify myself as a front-end developer, I am improving my front-end and back-end development skills to enhance and broaden my capabilities.

project2.title: Link saver
project2.description: An application for saving useful links with the ability to create groups and categorize them based on different 'topics'. It assists in managing a large number of links and saving them for the future.

project3.title: Personal portfolio
project3.description: My personal website serves as a platform where I showcase my projects and cultivate my career as a web developer. Here, you can explore my skills, achievements, and easily get in touch with me.

project1.title: Small in one
project1.description: A platform for visual representation of my small projects on a web page to track progress.

project2.title: Test Unistory
project2.description: The test includes interesting planet animation (attracting to the cursor), API requests, data loading on scroll, and more.

project3.title: Quote generator
project3.description: A simple quote generator where you can search for interesting quotes for yourself.

project4.title: Robo friends
project4.description: A small project with an API request and filtering of a robot (friends) list.

project5.title: Background generator
project5.description: This is the first project that generates a simple background using two colors. It is useful for finding a gradient.

lastDance.part1: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
